pages.text: 除了可以穿的装备以外，还有许多与恶魔有关的物品以及方块。

pages.title: 下界钢
pages.text: 一种奇怪的半金属物质，摸起来有种温暖的触感，就好像它是活物… 这种材料实在是过于... 易塑了，没办法用它来做成工具，但可以将其制作为装饰物或者崇拜雕像。它也在一些恶魔饰品的制造中起着重要作用。这种不太靠得住的材料的制作方法如下所示：

pages.title: 鄙夷方砖
pages.text: 无论周围气候如何，这种石板样且微泛红色的石头摸起来总是像夜晚那样清冷。将耳朵贴到石砖上，你可以惊恐地听到其尖叫以及哭泣的声音… 人们认为恶魔就是用这种材料建造它们的处所，借以躲过时天使的搜查，and can be created using the Hellworld brew on Embittered Bricks, as well as follows:

pages.title: 绝望方砖
pages.text: 有时可以在地狱的一些废弃角落看到这种方块，these ochre bricks are often associated with desolate wastes, where no soul receives any warmth from any light, and thus, rots for all eternity. The structures that dot these landscapes were believed to have been made by demons long-gone, and yet their recipe is as is:

pages.title: Statue
pages.text: Statues are large figures of major demons. They can be placed around statues, granting a boon, and sometimes, the favor of the demon itself.

pages.title: Leonard
pages.text: Leonard is known as being the King of the Witches.

pages.title: Baphomet
pages.text: Beware the Templars and their Goat idolatory.

pages.title: Lilith
pages.text: The Mistress of The Night feeds on the blood of men.

pages.title: Herne
pages.text: Hunter Orion believes he can hunt all.

pages.title: idol
pages.text: Idols are small effigies of a demon, often placed on altars by willing demonolators, who worship these infernal beings.
